comments:
Imported surveyweb.war which has some errors around 55

Open the deployment descriptor and modified the file 
Add the following to the dd after the <welcome-file-list> . Save and run 
validation. There should be no errors 

<security-role> 
    <description>This is a user He is cool</description> 
    <role-name>user</role-name> 
</security-role> 
<security-role> 
    <description>This is the boss</description> 
    <role-name>manager</role-name> 
</security-role> 

and add the following to the <servlet> element 

<security-role-ref> 
    <role-name>user role</role-name> 
    <role-link>user</role-link> 
</security-role-ref> 

Then change the role-link from user to user2 or something and saved 
and exception is thrown in the console
